body_html: I believe debug build is not supported, especially for gpu build. You may try to replace /DEBUG:Full with /DEBUG:Fastlink in your compiler flags. And you may also need to split tf_core_kernerls into multiple static libraries. And you need a debug build of python,cuda,... If I were you, I'll give up

body: I believe debug build is not supported, especially for gpu build. You may try to replace /DEBUG:Full with /DEBUG:Fastlink in your compiler flags. And you may also need to split tf_core_kernerls into multiple static libraries. And you need a debug build of python,cuda,... If I were you, I'll give up
